thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Datatec Sees FY HEPS Down At Least 20 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Datatec Sees FY HEPS Down At Least 20 Pct
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Datatec Ltd:
* ‍FY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE WILL BE AT LEAST 20 PCT (AT LEAST 0.4 US CENTS) LOWER THAN 2.0 US CENTS REPORTED IN FY17​
* FY ‍UNDERLYING EARNINGS PER SHARE WILL BE AT LEAST 20 PCT (AT LEAST 2.2 US CENTS) LOWER THAN 11.0 US CENTS REPORTED IN FY17​
* ‍FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FY18 WILL DIFFER BY AT LEAST 20 PCT FROM PREVIOUS CORRESPONDING PERIOD​
* FOR 2018 ‍UNDERLYING* EARNINGS PER SHARE WILL BE AT LEAST 20 PCT (AT LEAST 2.2 US CENTS) LOWER THAN 11.0 US CENTS REPORTED IN FY17​
* FOR 2018 ‍HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE WILL BE AT LEAST 20 PCT (AT LEAST 0.4 US CENTS) LOWER THAN 2.0 US CENTS REPORTED IN FY17​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
